96             # First, get the window ID of the browser with our URL
97             result = subprocess.run([
98                 "osascript", "-e",
99                 f'''
100                 tell application "Google Chrome"
101                     set windowIndex to 0
102                     repeat with w from 1 to count of windows
103                         repeat with t from 1 to count of tabs in window w
104                             if URL of tab t of window w contains "{url.replace('http://', '')}" then
105                                 set windowIndex to w
106                                 exit repeat
107                             end if
108                         end repeat
109                         if windowIndex > 0 then exit repeat
110                     end repeat
111                     if windowIndex > 0 then
112                         set index of window windowIndex to 1
113                         activate
114                     end if
115                 end tell
116                 '''
117             ], capture_output=True, text=True, timeout=5)
